        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">E-mail as a teaching tool</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">E-mail als unterrichtendes Hilfsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E-mail comme outil d'enseignement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E-mail como uma ferramenta ensinando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E-mail come strumento d'istruzione</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">E-mail como herramienta de enseñanza</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A teachers personal experiences and suggestions for using e-mail as a tool for teaching.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Persönliche Erfahrungen und Vorschläge der

Unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences et suggestions personnelles de

          </description>

          </description>

ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο ως εργαλείο για τη διδασκαλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
